message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product. I think you'll really like it!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I would like to propose a price of $130 for the product.
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $142.50. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $137.5 for the product.
I'm glad we're still in negotiations, Bob. I can see you're serious about this product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm going to propose $140. What do you think?
